name: EMONYO
description:
EMONYO is action - puzzle game in which your task is to destroy all enemies, but not by quick reaction, instead of that you have to use your mind.

Enemies can only be destroyed by pushing or puling them into water or spikes wall using your shield or hook.

After every move you make enemies make their moves and if you get in their attack zone- they will attack you. Different enemies have different weapons, but unlike you- they only have one kind of weapon: some can attack you with their sword only if you are next to them and some can attack you from any distance with their shield or bow if you are in the same line as they are and not protected by walls.
